<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_486042_se_pjt_tr_comp_off</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>co_crnumber_update</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	cr = current.getValue("u_change_number");

	var gr = new GlideRecord("change_request");
	gr.addQuery("number", cr);
	gr.query();
// 	gr.next();
	starting = gr.get("work_start");
// 	current.setValue("change_start_time", starting);
	current.change_start_time = starting;
	current.update("due to change");
	gs.addErrorMessage(starting);
	current.setAbortAction(true);
	
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-23 03:26:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>408b021e1bd8101023c27596cc4bcb00</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>co_crnumber_update</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SE Project Tracker" source="x_486042_se_pjt_tr">69444e861b10101023c27596cc4bcb20</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SE Project Tracker">69444e861b10101023c27596cc4bcb20</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_408b021e1bd8101023c27596cc4bcb00</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-23 03:50:58</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=408b021e1bd8101023c27596cc4bcb00"/></record_update>
